name: Prism Protector
description:
Prism Protector was created for Ludum Dare 51. The theme was Every 10 Seconds.

Game created by Shiiro

Music created with Bosca Ceoil

(https://terrycavanagh.itch.io/bosca-ceoil)

Sounds Created with Chiptone (https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone)

Fonts from Google Fonts

Cormorant Upright - Open Font License

Amita - Open Font License
